.class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit HealthCheckApplicationBuilderExtensions extends System.Object

MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder UseHealthChecks (this Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder app, Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.PathString path);

.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder UseHealthChecks(class Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder app, valuetype Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.PathString path) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function UseHealthChecks (app As IApplicationBuilder, path As PathString) As IApplicationBuilder
static member UseHealthChecks : Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder * Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.PathString -> Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder

Docs.param: The path on which to provide health check status.
Docs.summary: Adds a middleware that provides health check status.
Docs.returns: A reference to the after the operation has completed.

remarks.para: If is set to null or the empty string then the health check middleware will ignore the URL path and process all requests. If is set to a non-empty value, the health check middleware will process requests with a URL that matches the provided value of case-insensitively, allowing for an extra trailing slash ('/') character.
The health check middleware will use default settings from .

static member UseHealthChecks : Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder * Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.PathString * int -> Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder

Docs.param: The path on which to provide health check status.
The port to listen on. Must be a local port on which the server is listening.
Docs.summary: Adds a middleware that provides health check status.
Docs.returns: A reference to the after the operation has completed.

remarks.para: If is set to null or the empty string then the health check middleware will ignore the URL path and process all requests on the specified port. If is set to a non-empty value, the health check middleware will process requests with a URL that matches the provided value of case-insensitively, allowing for an extra trailing slash ('/') character.
The health check middleware will use default settings from .
